refnamediv.refpurpose: Sends a MIDI note with definite duration to a VST plugin.

refsect1.title: Syntax
refsect1.synopsis: vstnote instance, kchan, knote, kveloc, kdur

refsect1.title: Description
refsect1.para: vstnote sends a MIDI note with definite duration to a VST plugin.

refsect1.title: Initialization
refsect1.para: instance - the number which identifies the plugin generated by vstinit.

refsect1.title: Performance
refsect1.para: kchan - The MIDI channel to trasnmit the note on. Note that MIDI channels are numbered starting from 0.
knote - The MIDI note number to send.
kdur - The MIDI note's duration in seconds.
Note: Be sure the instrument containing vstnote is not finished before the duration of the note, otherwise you'll have a 'hung' note.
